code: import{CREATE_ORDER,CLEAR_CART,CLEAR_ORDER,FETCH_ORDERS}from"../types";export var createOrder=function createOrder(order){return function(dispatch){fetch("/api/orders",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(order)}).then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){dispatch({type:CREATE_ORDER,payload:data});localStorage.clear("cartItems");dispatch({type:CLEAR_CART});});};};export var clearOrder=function clearOrder(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:CLEAR_ORDER});};};export var fetchOrders=function fetchOrders(){return function(dispatch){fetch("/api/orders").then(function(res){return res.json();}).then(function(data){dispatch({type:FETCH_ORDERS,payload:data});});};};
